Author: Barry S. Stahl
Description: Hauver emerged as a key component of the young 2018 Sun Devils team, becoming one of 6 Freshman to start more than 20 games for ASU Baseball that year. The young outfielder is back in 2019 and is again a critical piece of this squad, starting all 23 games thusfar and slashing .379/.496/.667.
Title: Sophomore Trevor Hauver
